front.title: •••Advosze
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Whenever you deploy a weapon or device from hand at same location, activate 1 Force as a 'kickback.' Limit of one Advosze per location.
front.lore: Typical of male Advosze, Bom Vimdin despises those of his own species. Pessimistic and territorial, he is a lone smuggler who prefers to work for corrupt officials.
